doc:
Philip Bosco https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philip_Bosco 0 Philip Michael Bosco (September 26, 1930 – December 3, 2018) was an American actor. He was known for his Tony Award-winning performance as Saunders in the 1989 Broadway production of Lend Me a Tenor, and for his starring role in the 2007 film The Savages. Philip_Michael_Bosco ( September_26_,_1930 – December_3_,_2018 ) was an_American_actor . He was_known for his_Tony_Award-winning_performance as Saunders in the_1989_Broadway_production of Lend Me a_Tenor , and for his_starring_role in the_2007_film The_Savages .
